# Biography

I am a third-year student at Universiti Brunei Darussalam (UBD), pursuing BSc in Mathematics. As a first-generation university student, I am honored to be a recipient of the Brunei Darussalam Government Scholarship for Foreign Students (BDGS), recognizing my commitment to academic excellence and leadership.

Recently, I participated in a visiting student research program at King Abdullah University of Science & Technology (KAUST), where I have the privilege of working under the supervision of [Prof. Haavard Rue](https://cemse.kaust.edu.sa/profiles/haavard-rue) and [Dr. Haziq Jamil](https://haziqj.ml). My work focuses on spatial statistics, and data simulation & estimation of latent trait models: Item Response Theory (IRT) using Bayesian methods.
